Author: williamsmade1578
Text: my boyfriend is the most caring and precious soul. he was very kind ab it and never pressured me to eat. listened when i cried about not wanting to eat. being there holding my hand while i cry at myself how hungry i am trying to get me to it. there are really great ppl out there ❤️

Author: piipiistorm
Text: I binge and restrict.   My wife was understandably pissed. She cried and asked me to go speak to a counselor. I'm still a bit of a chubster so she doesnt seem to notice when I binge. I'm always honest about my restricting even though i know it hurts her, I cant lie to my wife like that.
